channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Ofcom wants to double down on file monitoring in 2026
item.description: Experts are concerned about the precedent it may set for users' privacy, despite Ofcom ensuring that measures should not break "end-to-end encryption."

item.title: This tiny new DAC gives your phone, laptop or games console the audio skills of the world's best hi-res music player
item.description: It's the size of a lighter but the HC5 is a delighter –and A&K's new earbuds are pretty special too

item.title: Leclerc fête Noël en avance et vous fait économiser 200 € sur ce laptop HP performant (Ryzen AI 5, 24 Go RAM et 512 Go SSD)
item.description: Grâce à son Ryzen AI 5, cet HP Omnibook 3 peut devenir un véritable allié que vous soyez étudiant ou professionnel et bonne nouvelle : son prix tombe à 599 euros au lieu de 799 euros à Leclerc.

item.title: AI Is Getting Better at Hacking Crypto’s Smart Contracts
item.description: And the arguments have already started.

item.title: Netflix rachète officiellement Warner Bros pour 82 milliards de dollars : que va-t-il se passer pour le prix des abonnements ?
item.description: Netflix vient d'acquérir Warner Bros Discovery et HBO Max pour 82,7 milliards de dollars. Une opération qui devrait bouleverser l’équilibre d’Hollywood et avoir des effets concrets sur le prix des abonnements.

item.title: Netflix agrees $82.7 billion deal to buy Warner Bros. Discovery – and claims it’ll result in 'more choice and greater value for consumers'
item.description: A giant entertainment deal is agreed for over $80 billion, but it'll face opposition

item.title: Panne momentanée sur plusieurs sites liée au fournisseur Cloudflare
item.description: Une panne a touché vendredi plusieurs sites internet, dont le réseau social du président américain Truth Social, et les sites Canva et Doctolib, en raison d’un problème identifié par le fournisseur américain de services en ligne Cloudflare.

item.title: ‘A solution looking for a problem that doesn’t exist’: Logitech CEO blasts AI gadgets – and most people think that’s being generous
item.description: Logitech’s CEO has called AI gadgets “solutions looking for a problem,” and judging by the online backlash, most people think even that’s putting it politely.

item.title: The Best Meal Replacement Shakes for Total Life Optimization (2025)
item.description: Solve the problem of cooking and chewing food with these full-meal replacement drinks.

item.title: EU fines X $140 million over ‘deceptive’ blue checkmarks
item.description: The European Union has served Elon Musk’s X with a €120 million (about $140 million) penalty for violating the bloc’s digital service rulebook, in part for the “deceptive design” of its blue checkmark. Today’s announcement marks the first time that a company has been fined under the landmark Digital Services Act (DSA) law for curbing […]

item.title: The Vin Diesel ‘Rock ‘Em, Sock ‘Em Robots’ Movie Has a New Writer: Vin Diesel
item.description: The 'Fast & Furious' star is now attached to write, headline, and produce the Mattel adaptation.

item.title: AI Slop Is Ruining Reddit for Everyone
item.description: Reddit is considered one of the most human spaces left on the internet, but mods and users are overwhelmed with slop posts in the most popular subreddits.

item.title: What is the release date for Robin Hood episode 7 on MGM+?
item.description: With four episodes left to go, Rob's revenge is getting closer by the minute. But when can we watch Robin Hood episode 7 on MGM+?

item.title: Windows 11's Run prompt is getting a makeover and a handy extra power – but already there are worries Microsoft will ruin it
item.description: An ancient part of Windows 11 is seemingly getting a makeover – but people are scared Microsoft's going to somehow make it sluggish.

item.title: Nvidia : je peux enfin rejouer à certains de mes jeux cultes avec cette mise à jour
item.description: L'abandon malencontreux de la technologie PhysX par les dernières cartes graphiques RTX 5000 de Nvidia avait eu pour conséquence de limiter cruellement les performances de certains jeux cultes d'ancienne génération. Une mise à jour va tout changer (et me permettre de rejouer dignement à Mirror's Edge).

item.title: Mieux que Microsoft ? Cet outil gratuit pour Windows 11 corrige le plus gros défaut de l’Explorateur de fichiers
item.description: Vous pouvez sensiblement améliorer la vitesse de lancement de l'Explorateur de fichiers avec une simple manipulation. Ou quand un outil tiers fait encore mieux que Microsoft.

item.title: How Long Should You Stay in a Sauna? (2025)
item.description: Optimize your sauna session by listening to the experts and, more importantly, your body.

item.title: Cette immense étude sur la fiabilité est sans appel : le Tesla Model Y sacré meilleure voiture électrique, mais tout le monde n’y arrive pas
item.description: Consumer Reports, une association américaine de consommateurs, vient d'établir son classement de fiabilité automobile de 2025. Si Toyota continue de survoler la concurrence, Tesla signe la meilleure progression de l'année avec le Model Y sacré "voiture électrique la plus fiable"… mais d'autres marques restent à la peine.

item.title: Fibre : c’est la fin du cauchemar des « débranchements sauvages »
item.description: Vous en avez assez du technicien qui vient raccorder le voisin et qui repart en ayant coupé votre ligne ? Bonne nouvelle : Bouygues, Orange et SFR s'allient enfin pour éradiquer ce fléau grâce à une nouvelle technologie déployée dès maintenant.

item.title: SACD is back, baby! This beefy new audiophile CD player is deliciously '90s, and has built-in tube amplification as a bonus
item.description: Money No Object: One of the rising stars of 'chi-fi' brings a new reference CD player, with powerful DAC skills

item.title: Cet écran Alienware a tout ce qu’il faut pour plaire aux gamers : du QD-OLED, 280 Hz, 0,03 ms dans un format 27″ avec une belle remise de 150 €
item.description: Avec le modèle AW2725D vous avez un écran avec une dalle QD-OLED, une fréquence que seules les machines affûtées peuvent encaisser. Si vous cherchez le cadeau parfait pour un joueur, ce moniteur a tout pour finir sous le sapin, même son prix est en promo avec 449 euros au lieu de 599 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Upgrade your gaming audio with the stylish SteelSeries Arctis Gamebuds – now $50 off
item.description: Upgrade your gaming audio with these stylish gaming earbuds at a discounted price.

item.title: Facebook and Instagram have a new hub to help get hijacked accounts back
item.description: Meta on Thursday announced it is launching a new, centralized support hub for Facebook and Instagram, acknowledging that getting help hasn’t always been as easy as it should be. The space will bring together all the support features users of both networks need to report account issues or recover one they’ve lost access to. “Getting […]

item.title: Walmart-backed PhonePe winds down its Pincode app in yet another e-commerce step back
item.description: PhonePe has shut down its Pincode app over two years after its debut.

item.title: Gemini 3 Deep Think rolls out to paid subscribers
item.description: After launching Gemini 3 in late November, Google is rolling out its latest Deep Think mode to AI Ultra subscribers.

item.title: This new anonymous phone carrier doesn’t even need your name – here are 5 things you should know about it
item.description: Phreeli doesn't need your name, address, or almost any other details to provide you with mobile service.

item.title: Nouvelle panne d’Internet : Cloudflare pointe du doigt une mise à jour de sécurité
item.description: Une nouvelle panne vient de frapper Cloudflare. Des milliers de sites semblent tout à coup inaccessibles. Alors qu'une partie d'Internet est à nouveau hors service, Cloudflare indique avoir ouvert une enquête sur le problème survenu, qui découle d'une simple mise à jour de sécurité. Tout semble être rentré dans l'ordre peu aprés.

item.title: Netflix Is One Step Closer to Buying Warner Bros.
item.description: The streaming giant has emerged at the top of the pile after the bidding war for Warner Bros., in a deal that could change the balance of power in Hollywood forever.

item.title: Our Favorite Science Books to Gift This Year
item.description: The smartest gifts are often the smartest books.

item.title: Huge Trove of Nude Images Leaked by AI Image Generator Startup’s Exposed Database
item.description: An AI image generator startup’s database was left accessible to the open internet, revealing more than 1 million images and videos, including photos of real people who had been “nudified.”

item.title: Pluribus episode 6 features the wildest cameo I've seen in 2025, and nobody realized it was foreshadowed weeks ago
item.description: Pluribus episode 6 has blindsided fans with an appearance that some are calling the "cameo of the year".

item.title: The unexpected winner of the AI data center boom
item.description: AI has fueled data center hyper-growth. While everyone debates the value of all this new infrastructure, one clear victor has emerged. The data center boom is fully underway, and the numbers are staggering: billions of dollars in costs, millions of square feet worth of buildings, gigawatts of energy, and millions of gallons of water used per day. But before these AI-fueling behemoths can get up and running, there’s an extensive amount of prep work needed to build the infrastructure those data centers rely upon, with a whole other set of staggering costs, material flows, and resource requiremen...

item.title: iPhone 17 resellers are seeing ‘bulk quantities’ traded in
item.description: Here’s their resale price. While the iPhone 17 is expected to be one of the hottest gifts this holiday season, some of the early adopters of Apple’s latest phone may be moving on to something different already.

item.title: Columbia’s new Star Wars drop walks thin line between cosplay and clothing
item.description: The outerwear brand has perfected the art of IP-wear. Columbia Sportswear just lauched its Endor collection, and I want it all. Inspired by the clothes worn by the rebel squad that took on the Death Star’s shield generator in Return of the Jedi, it’s the latest and largest Star Wars drop from Portland, Oregon-based company. It’s also the best fit for the brand since its Empire Strikes Back‘s Echo Base Han Solo parkas, which I missed back in 2017, and I will forever feel like a dumb Tauntaun for not grabbing one (they run for almost $1,000 each now)....
